page.title: 12SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {DRAINAGE and REFUSE}No mains drainage. Sewage disposal is by septic tank or cesspit. Refuse is collected weekly. {MILK DISTRIBUTION}There are two milk distributors. One daily with newspapers (no milk on Sunday). The other delivers milk only three times a week. {SOCIAL SERVICES}Social sevices call on one household. The district nurse visits those in need regularly. A chiropodist, based in Winchester, visits three people once every three months. {SECURITY}High rate of domestic burglaries. Many homes have security systems,alarms etc.
